channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: March 31 Is World Backup Day
item.description: March 31 is World Backup Day, when experts suggest that you backup your data today and every day so you don’t end up being an April Fool.

item.title: How B2B Companies Can Optimize Customer Service Management To Charge AI-Driven Growth
item.description: AI is helping to supercharge the connection between businesses and customers, but certain steps are necessary to optimize CSM solutions.

item.title: How Artificial Intelligence Is Changing Creative Testing Of Ads
item.description: The article discusses how human informed artificial intelligence is changing advertising copytesting for the better. Peter Daboll of DAIVID is intervi...

item.title: The Rise Of AI And Machine Learning In SaaS
item.description: AI features are crucial developments for the SaaS market and SaaS users.

item.title: Branching Out: Why Shift From IT Monoculture To Open Source
item.description: Ecosystem diversity is vital in fostering innovation, strengthening security and ensuring long-term resilience in IT.

item.title: Division is easier than connection

item.title: “Be yourself”

item.title: Toward leggiero

item.title: Obvious vs perhaps
item.description: “Obvious” closes the door to inquiry. “Perhaps” opens it.
